name: AlcheScape
description:
Game made for the United GameJam 2020

In AlcheScape you have to Found every escaped / dead end of the room within 2 mins, 

You are a thief who has infiltrated a castle, unfortunately you were spotted, so you locked yourself in the alchemist's room. Your only way out of here is to escape, but the guards are trying to break the door down, you have only 2 minutes to escape.

Game played on gamemaker studio 2
Design by Thesandgamer and JiclonB, code by Thesandgamer, Art by Anxis, both jv students.

Theme: two, two minutes to succeed, two objects to mix
